Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Four Points by Sheraton Cancun Centro places you in the heart of Cancun, steps from Galenia Hospital and close to Hospiten Hospital. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Plaza Nichupte Shopping Mall and Dubai Palace Casino.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 112 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a 24-hour health club, an outdoor pool, and a steam room. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Planning an event in Cancun? This hotel has 2121 square feet (197 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

A stay at Four Points by Sheraton Cancun Centro places you in the heart of Cancun, steps from Galenia Hospital and close to Hospiten Hospital. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Plaza Nichupte Shopping Mall and Dubai Palace Casino.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Galenia Hospital - 0 km / 0 mi
Hospiten Hospital - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Plaza Nichupte Shopping Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Dubai Palace Casino - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Yak Casino and Sports Book - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Amerimed Hospital - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Kabah Urban Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Malecon Americas Shopping Mall - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Cancun Cultural House - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Beto Avila Baseball Stadium - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Andres Quintana Roo Stadium - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Ceviche Square - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
La Sagrada Familia Parish - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Caliente Casino - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
La Gran Plaza Shopping Mall - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

The preferred airport for Four Points by Sheraton Cancun Centro is Cancun, Quintana Roo (CUN-Cancun Intl.) - 11.6 km / 7.2 mi.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
